講得好！

Morata: "For me, it’s easy. I could have gone back to Spain or Italy, all the people believe in me there but I want to change all the things here. I want to, not for all the haters, but for me and for Chelsea." #CFC

Morata: “Chelsea gave me everything in one moment that I needed and now I have a lot of time to give back all that Chelsea give me and I can’t wait to win trophies and to play again." #CFC

Morata: “I am looking forward to buy a house and I can’t wait for the babies to grow up to put them into school. I am very happy and it’s just the beginning of the new season. Why would I not be happy? I want to change all the thinking from the people who say I’m not." #CFC

Morata on Sarri's style: “For me the most important things is the way we play. Last season it was direct balls and for me to protect the ball in the air and I think it’s not my best quality." #CFC

Morata: “Now I can attack the space, I can play one touch and go in the area for the crosses. I think it’s better for me and we play better. We need to improve little things, but I think in this way we are very dangerous and can play against any team in the world.” #CFC

【now.com體育】周日曼聯以2:3負白禮頓，在護級分子身上吞下今季首敗的領隊摩連奴自然心情欠佳，讓記者吃盡苦頭。
輸波的摩連奴（Jose Mourinho）賽後接受beIN Sport的女記者卡莉布朗訪問，回答首個問題時已顯得很不耐煩，一句起兩句止，之後記者再問到曼聯球員在球場上的默契是否有問題，摩帥馬上出言譏諷：「你竟然夠資格講球員默契，你一定係撈得好掂頂喇！」 記者愣了一愣，但還是再問了摩帥最後一條問題，結果也是被敷衍過去。事後女記者卡莉布朗將訪問片段在twitter上轉載，並附上一個「無奈」的表情符號。 雖然曼聯上季得到聯賽第2名，但今夏摩連奴因買人問題與高層鬧得很不愉快，據報更衣室氣氛亦十分之緊張，今場不敵弱旅，摩帥難免燥底。
